snippet: “The Art and Ecstasy of the Chaconne” was presented at the New York Society for Ethical Culture to celebrate the fifth anniversary of the Gotham Early Music Scene.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews musical program The Art and Ecstasy of the Chaconne, presented by Gotham Early Music Scene at the New York Society for Ethical Culture.
lead_paragraph: “The Art and Ecstasy of the Chaconne” was presented at the New York Society for Ethical Culture to celebrate the fifth anniversary of the Gotham Early Music Scene.

headline.seo: ‘The Art and Ecstasy of the Chaconne,’ at Ethical Culture
